<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""utf-8"" ?>
	<access-policy>
	  <cross-domain-access>
		<policy>
		  <allow-from http-request-headers=""*"">
			<domain uri=""*""/>
		  </allow-from>
		  <grant-to>
			<resource include-subpaths=""true"" path=""/""/>
		  </grant-to>
		</policy>
	  </cross-domain-access>
	</access-policy>
